entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170001}Y-You came! I had given up, thinking{F801}you'd forgotten about me...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170001}Y-You came! I had given up, thinking{F801}you'd forgotten about me...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170002}Tayama and his men left. They said{F801}something about war at Ichigaya...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170002}Tayama and his men left. They said{F801}something about war at Ichigaya...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170003}But enough of that, my brave fellows.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,170004}I shall give these to you. I took them{F801}while Tayama was away.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170003}But enough of that, my brave fellows.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,170004}I shall give these to you. I took them{F801}while Tayama was away.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170005}Take them! They're a token of my gratitude.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170005}Take them! They're a token of my gratitude.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170006}I will... stay here a while more.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170006}I will... stay here a while more.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170007}Not to wait out the conflict, but to...{F801}find more mystic relics...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,0,170007}Not to wait out the conflict, but to...{F801}find more mystic relics...{F801}
